segments.text: Could you tell me how to use the library ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . All you need is your student ID card or admission card to check out books and read journals or magazines in the library .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How many books am I allowed to check out at a time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Two books at a time . Except magazines or journals , they have to be read within library .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long can I keep the books ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: For one month . If you can ’ t return the books in time , you'll be fined . But if you renew them , you can keep them longer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . Now I want to check out two books on spoken English . Can you show me where I can find them ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , just over there to your right .
segments.speaker: S2
